title: UPDATE LOG #2
entries: Added 3 modes to redirection: mouse, remote, namecall, raycast [with wallbang for 0 delay games]
Added silent aim [soon fov with gradient]
Added 3 positions to FOV (mouse, center, barrel (gun)) and added Lerp option

entries.text: Added highlight target/client system, material changer for client, and avatar changer using user ID (with GUI)
Added many new visuals including China effects, hats, auras, and walkspeed customization
